# A  {#sec-A.unnumbered}

In this part of the book we will look at the geoms starts with letter "a" or "A".

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
geom <- c('geom_area',
          'geom_abline',
          'geom_alluvium',
          'geom_arc',
          'geom_arc_bar',
          'geom_arrow',
          'geom_ash')
section <- c(3.1, 3.2, 3.3, 3.4, 3.5)
df1 <- data.frame(geom = geom,
                  section = section)
df1 |> knitr::kable()
```
